goal: Order two 12oz bags of 'Stumptown Holler Mountain' whole bean coffee on Omnizon. Then, add a reminder to my calendar for 3 weeks from today to 'Re-order coffee'.

evals.description: Coffee was added to cart or order was placed on Omnizon
evals.query: omnizon.cart != null && length(omnizon.cartDiff.added) > `0` || omnizon.orders != null && length(omnizon.orders.added) > `0`

evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Calendar event or reminder was created on GoCalendar
evals.query: gocalendar.events != null && length(gocalendar.eventsDiff.added) > `0` || gocalendar.reminders != null && length(gocalendar.remindersDiff.added) > `0`
